scripts.build:browserify: mkdir -p $npm_package_config_browserify_output_folder && browserify $npm_package_config_browserify_input --debug --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --transform [ browserify-shim ] --transform [ es3ify --global true ] --transform [ browserify-shim --global ] --plugin [ minifyify --compressPath . --map $npm_package_config_browserify_sourcemap_uri --output $npm_package_config_browserify_sourcemap ] --outfile $npm_package_config_browserify_output --verbose
scripts.watch:browserify: mkdir -p $npm_package_config_browserify_output_folder &&   watchify $npm_package_config_browserify_input --debug --transform [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] --transform [ browserify-shim ] --transform [ es3ify --global true ] --transform [ browserify-shim --global ] --plugin [ minifyify --compressPath . --map $npm_package_config_browserify_sourcemap_uri --output $npm_package_config_browserify_sourcemap ] --outfile $npm_package_config_browserify_output --verbose
